RevokServer - Class in us.pserver.revok.server
Network HTTP object server for remote method invocation.
RevokServer(ObjectContainer) - Constructor for class us.pserver.revok.server.RevokServer
Default constructor receives the ObjectContainer with the objects whose methods will be invoked.
RevokServer(ObjectContainer, HttpConnector) - Constructor for class us.pserver.revok.server.RevokServer
Constructor which receives the ObjectContainer with the objects whose methods will be invoked and the network information object HttpConnector.
RevokServer(ObjectContainer, HttpConnector, ObjectSerializer) - Constructor for class us.pserver.revok.server.RevokServer
Constructor which receives the ObjectContainer, the network information HttpConnector and the default object serializer for encoding transmitted objects.
